name: mineore
title: Miner Planner
author: CrazyFeSS
description: Automates mining drill placement on ore patches with transport belts, electric poles, and beacons. Drag-select an area, configure drills, belts, poles, and beacons via icon-based GUI, then ghost entities are placed in paired-row layouts ready for bots. Supports all drill types, belt tiers, pole types, and resources across all planets.
